briefTitle: Long-Term Safety and Tolerability of Degarelix One-Month Dosing Regimen in Korean Patients
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Multi-Centre, Extension Trial, Evaluating the Long-Term Safety and Tolerability of Degarelix One-Month Dosing Regimen in Korean Patients Requiring Androgen Ablation Therapy
summary: This is an open-label, multi-centre single arm trial to investigate long-term safety and tolerability of degarelix in Korean patients with prostate cancer.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Markedly Abnormal Values in Safety Laboratory Variables
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From baseline (day 0) to end of treatment (up to day 364)
